titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Infection Prevention Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
10/23/2007--Introduced.
Expresses support for: (1) the goals and ideals of National Infection Prevention Week; and (2) raising awareness of the importance of preventing health care-associated infections.
